To set an alarm, go to settings and grant permission
If the alarm is on, you\'ll receive a "call" to your smartphone after the raid boss is defeated. You\'ll have up to three minutes to complete the quest.\n
Why didn\'t I receive a call or received it with delay?\n

From the server side, information is usually sent within the first minute, but there may be additional delays on the Android side with receiving the notification.\n\nSome Android smartphones may enter Doze mode to save resources, and the notification check interval is increased. To increase the chance of receiving the call instantly, I recommend keeping the phone charged.
Looks like you have a Xiaomi
The alarm may not appear on the locked screen. Enable the "Lock screen" permission for everything to work correctly.
30 seconds after launch, you\'ll receive a test alarm on your phone. To make sure everything is working correctly, completely close the app and lock the screen.
